solution_line_template: In the first row, there are now {first_row_initial} – {first_row_left} = <<{first_row_initial}-{first_row_left}={first_row_now}>>{first_row_now} people.
In the second row, there are now {second_row_initial} – {second_row_left} = <<{second_row_initial}-{second_row_left}={second_row_now}>>{second_row_now} people.

So in total there are {first_row_now} in the first row + {second_row_now} in the second row + {third_row} in the third row = <<{first_row_now}+{second_row_now}+{third_row}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
